==Arch Linux==

In console:

_packman -S mget_


==Debian/Ubuntu==

Add the following line to your /etc/apt/sources.list

`deb http://mget.ircfans.org/ ./`

In console:

_apt-get update && apt-get install mget_


==Windows==

Download [http://mget.googlecode.com/files/mget-1.17-win.exe windows installer].
